price: 109. Moominiiney isin Amah siini Ama marah (tuqma deqsita numih mara kinnuk) Addunyâ manol hawissaanaah keenih Sumaaqittaanahak, tokkel Qhiyaamah ayró Ama gano abak Yallih digaala iyyi waase-lee? hinnak Abba iyyi keenik Akkeleeh iyyi ken cate-lee?
arabic: هَٰٓأَنتُمۡ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ جَٰدَلۡتُمۡ عَنۡهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا فَمَن يُجَٰدِلُ ٱللَّهَ عَنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ أَم مَّن يَكُونُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: hāantum hāulāi jādaltum ʿanhum fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā faman yujādilu al-laha ʿanhum yawma al-qiyāmati am man yakūnu ʿalayhim wakīlan
